comments.comment: Good job dad
pewds character development from "Kids are very dumb" into "Im officially a dad". Congrats pewds
Bjorn growing up and speaking Swedish, Italian, Japanese, and English. He's gonna be a polyglot if Marzia and Felix teach him at an early age, babies learn quick.
We are not just bro's anymore, now we are uncles
That kid is so blessed, having a Swedish dad, an Italian mom, both speaking English and living in Japan, he'll speak so many languages and that's amazing.
From raising 100 million people to a child, you sir deserve a medal
Congrats!!!
watching Felix play and scream at horror games feels like million years ago and  now he’s a dad. wow. time flies.
Congratulations Felix!
First we were bros, and now we're uncles. Congratulations Felix!!!
Had a huge smile on my face throughout this entire video

7:03 " He seems so chill" 
jajaja first impressions of your baby  so happt for you 2

it says alot that whenever felix says he's feeling anxious or tired, he always goes "i wonder how marzia is feeling". that kind of empathy and care felix has for her without her even being in the room speaks volumes on their relationship. theyll be absolutely wonderful parents
Just remembering the old Pewdiepie videos from like over 10 years ago, and here you are now. You've come a really long way man, congrats
he raised a whole generation on YouTube and now he's raising his own little one. love you pewds, thanks for being part of our childhood too :)
These videos aren’t for us, they are for his family… his son in particular. This is so sweet.
He is the father of an entire generation. YouTube dad.Congratulations Felix.
Felix, big congratulations on having your personal 9 year old, hope you and Marzia rest a lot!  Wish you the best!! I am so happy for you!!

Seeing PewDiePie go from playing horror video games on a 480p camera to now becoming a father over a decade later is so surreal. Congratulations to you both! I wish you happiness in your years to come as a family.
The way he talks about Marzia in this video is honestly adorable. <3
This baby gets to grow up with his dads massive catalog of content
With the way Felix treats and talks about marzia, he’s going to be an amazing dad. They’re gonna grow to be such a beautiful family
It's insane to see the journey of how Felix went from being a kid who screamed at barrels to being a dad and married. The time has gone by so fast. Congratulations to the pair of you!
and now bjorn is 1 yr old. time flies so fast
The father of YouTube is now a father , congratulations Felix!
As a swed, I have watched this man going from touring sheep to being a dad. Tack för min barndom Felix.
PewDiePie literally raised a generation of bros and now he’s getting to raise his own little bro. I’m really getting old.
i still can’t believe how far Pewds and Marzia have come, i remember watching Marzia scare Pewds while he played games. it’s crazy how fast time flies
Can’t believe I’ve seen pewds go from playing goat simulator to dad in a matter of 10 years. Congratulations Felix and Marzia

Felix is literally living the dream. He retired at 30, which is the right time for them to have a child. Now that he has Bjorn, he'll be able to spend his retirement with his kid without any financial worry which not a lot of people are blessed to have that opportunity.
We watched you grow up from the shy, Swedish kid to the confident father you’ve become. Proud of you, Felix.

I’ve been here since 2012. Now I’m 28 and you’re a dad. It’s crazy how time flies. Congratulations, Pewds. This kind of made me reconcile with the idea of being a mum. We will see. For now, I wish you and Marzia the best. You are going to be such great parents ️

From seeing Felix in a closet pretty much, recoring horror games to first meeting Marzia all the way to them moving to Japan and now being a father years and years later is such a crazy journey im glad I got to witness. So happy for them I honestly feel like they are the definition of a true fairytale story lol congrats on your beautiful son Björn you two. You are going to be amazing parents to the new soon to be 9 year old king! All hail everyone haha
From screaming at barrels to being a dad. Congrats Pewds!
felix talking about marzia is so endearing and heartwarming. you can just tell how much he loves and worries about her :((
From watching you play games with a pink headset and pink microphone (2014) to becoming a father brings a tear to my eye.
Big respect for Marzia for recording clips while literally in Hospital waiting to give birth.. what a champion
Marzia is such a fighter, giving birth, staying up late, baking muffins the next day. Props to her ! She's going to be a wonderful mother, I can already tell !
You are responsible for raising a whole generation of people behind a screen, what’s one more. Congratulations Felix and Marzia.
This is so amazing. And I love how gentle Edgar is being. Y’all r amazing.
You raised an entire generation of kids/teens online, and now your time to raise your own is here. I think you'll be ok. You did a lot of good already
This is such a HUGE internet milestone, to see this legend become a father. Good for you, Pewds.

I can't believe I went from seeing this guy make silly faces and play Amnesia and get scared to being a grown, mature man with a child. This is such a beautiful story and I'm glad you've decided to share it with us Pewds. To 10 years of fangirling
Swedish and Italian all in one tiny little bundle of joy. Congrats pewds. Or should i say Papa Pewds

Felix describing his son as "seems very chill" is the most funny and cute thing this year by far. We are literally witnessing a man's life journey right now with all the confusions and complications. It's unbelievable. Congrats Pewds and Marz, y'all did amazing!
It's insane thinking about the fact that we grew up with this man, to the point where a lot of us went from high school kids to almost 30. Congratulations Felix and Marzia.

Other families: Our baby's first word

Pewds and Marzia: Our baby's first brofist
Congrats fam
pewds deserves this. after he raised 2 generations of memers, he is ready to raise his own. what a legend
Congratulations peewdiepie couldn’t take the smile of my face the entire video
Been watching since I was 12-13, am now 24 years old. I couldn’t feel more proud and happy for someone I’ve never met before.

Watching this man grow and growing with him honestly makes me sad in a happy way that life moves so quickly. I remember running home and watching Felix after school playing happy wheels and now he's a dad and a national treasure, congrats to you both!
I'm so happy he posted this almost a month after Björn was born. It shows that they really are appreciating parenthood and are so genuine about this. Good luck to Felix and Marzia!
Literally teared up seeing the title. From a young lad to an actual father. Congratulations Felix and Marzia.
Watching you from a young screaming and funny teen to a responsible adult is such an honor seeing your progress in your life. Congratulations Pewds. Brofist

This is so amazing… I’ve been watching your videos since I was 12 years old.. I’m 22 now. I grew up with you in my life and I’m grateful. Thank you so much and congratulations on starting your own little family, we’re all proud of you Felix. We’re excited to continue on your journey with you ️
So many of us grew up together with Felix, and this makes me feel so sentimental! I'm so freaking happy for you man, hahah! Congratulations!

Man went from being a teen Youtube content-creator, having a girlfriend, married, pregnant wife, to a literal dad, look how far he has come, it's just very impressive and mind blowing how this man just carried our whole childhood and became a dad himself.
Old man Edgar meeting Felix and Marzia’s new son almost made me cry. I know Maya would have loved Björn. Congratulations both of you, he is absolutely adorable!
お子さんのキュンキュンした泣き声、めっちゃ癒されます。
It’s so surreal. It’s like yesterday he was doing fridays with pewdiepie and now he’s a dad. Proud of both of you.
Such a privilege to be let into this moment, congrats to Felix, Marzia and the luckiest...Björn
When I started watching Felix he was screaming in his basement and I was 12. Now he is a father and next week I'm starting with my masters thesis. Absolutely insane. .. time flies so insanely fast.
This is crazy watched you since I was a kid and now I’m 24 and your a dad, time flies by I wish you all the best man

Congrats 
Now you're legally allowed to make dad jokes
Seeing old man Edgar say hi to the baby was so heartwarming since Edgar has gone through everything with Felix and now he’s meeting the baby

It feels so weird. I was 12 when I started watching Felix's videos. I'm 22 now.
Seeing him evovled from a teenager who has no idea what he's doing in life to a dad.
The past 10 years have been a hell of a journey.
Look forward to another 10 years to see their son as a 10 year old.
Bless you all Felix and Marzia.
I just had my first child.  It has changed my life and I think who I am as a person.  I love my baby girl and I love being a dad!

Marzia looking like a literal angel after being a total warrior woman, such a beautiful little family, nothing but the best for the three of you. You'll be a good Dad Pewds, you and Marzia are so obviously in love, it's beautiful to see. Best wishes dude.
I legit cried when I saw him. Watching this as a viewer of 7 years is something else. Congratulations, Felix, Marzia, and Bjorn!

Isn't it crazy how Bjorn might grow up learning atleast 3 or 4 languages, english, swedish, italian, and japanese. Best wishes the father and the mother, good job to both of you pewds and marzia! im sure the baby will grow up fantastic with you 2, bless you both and congrats!
Tomorrow is his birthday!! And YouTube recommended me here on 10 July
From an actual 9 year old watching him play amnesia to him becoming a dad. Fucking hell I feel old.
It’s so weird that more than 10 years ago, I was watching Pewds playing Happy Wheels, and now he’s a father. Congratulations Felix and Marzia!!!
Pewdiepie is a dad now? WE ARE GETTING OLD

This is literally the best thing ever. You two are such an inspiration, your kindness, the life you've made for yourselves and the family you've created. Thank you so so much Pewds for making this channel a family as well, it feels like such a warm soft corner in the whole wide internet and it's incredible. I'm currently binging your videos since way before you even announced the pregnancy  (ofc i follow you on insta but still, video just hits differently) and watching this whole story unfold ever so beautifully has brought so many happy tears to my eyes. 
Thanks for including us in such important moments, sending you so much love <3
You raised us and now you’re raising your own child :) congrats Pewds
Congratulations
From watching Felix screaming his lounges out at barrels in Amnesia to becoming a father and happily married. Its really heartwarming. Congrats to both, you and Marzia.
I started watching Pewds in 2013 and I was 10 years old and now turning 20 this year. I'm so glad I was part of the journey. Congratulations daddy Pewds!
What a journey. Congratulations Felix and Marzia!
It's been one hell of a journey seeing Pewds going from playing horror games to being a dad. Congrats Felix.

weird to think I was 12 watching you play amnesia, and now as a 22 year old living on my own, watching you begin your family. I shed a few tears throughout this. I am so happy for you felix!
Edit: I mustve been younger then 12 lol!
congrats happy to se his mom healthy and staying strong still after all the things she went through
we all watched this man from alone in his room filming horror gameplay videos, to becoming a dad while having 111million, fully deserved subscirbers, we will never forget you
I can't even put into words how happy I am for Felix and Marzia. I'm on the brink of actually sobbing.
from barrels to babies, i feel old. congratulations pewds!
idk why im bingeing this video, i feel soo happy for pewds and marziaa, i was bawling 3 months ago
If you raised half of us through the screen you'll be more than prepared to be a dad
Congratulations Felix and Marzia!! :))
The fact that we watched this guy play scary games as a teen and now he’s a dad, wow Felix I love you man, you shaped my childhood.
So proud of you both. Been watching since I was 12/13 years old… crazy to see how you have become the man you are now Felix. Nothing but love to you, Marzia and little Bjorn!
Bjorn's going to grow up one day and realize how much of a legend his dad is during his prime.

From first discovering pewds playing Happy Wheels and Amnesia in the early 2010’s to now seeing him now as a proud dad makes me wanna tear up , the journey you’ve given us throughout the years will never compare to anyone else on this platform. Thank you for the laughs and endless amounts of joy you’ve shown us. Onto the next journey of fatherhood pewds! Brofist

Guys, we all grew up with this dude and he’s now having us experience this with him when he didn’t have to. Thank you so much felix and marzia for all that you do and congratulations on having bjorn. I’m so proud of you two
Remembering back to a QnA during the Friday with Pewdiepie days and pewds confidently saying they would never have kids. This is a trip and a half
wow this makes me smile so much, congratulations you'll be a great father! :D
When this kid grows he's going to have the privilege of bragging to all his friends that his dad Is Pewdiepie
This man went from being a quirky gamer to a full on dad congrats pewds we are gonna be growing grey hairs soon!

Man, I've been watching Pewds since wayyyy back in Amnesia days. It's incredible to me how all the people I went to school with are off doing their own things, and I couldn't care less. But watching this touches my heart. So beautiful to watch y'all come from a cute lil nerdy couple to a beautiful mature family.
